rows.label: qev010501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Please, Monica, you've got to understand.
As BLADEs, our first priority is coming home alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0002
rows.name:
And as the one responsible for this team, I have to
take the path with the least amount of risk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0003
rows.name:
So you want to give up his life to save ours? Pathetic!
...Look, if you don't want to go, that's fine.
I'll find Conner alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Monica, that's crazy! Will you please listen to me for
a second?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0005
rows.name:
...Huh? What is it? If you're out here, I'm guessing it's
because you're a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0006
rows.name:
In that case, let me ask you something. Should an
entire team risk their lives to rescue one single member?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0007
rows.name:
Or should that team run back to New LA like a pair of
sniveling cowards and wait for reinforcements?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_JNK0010
rows.name: Rescue

rows.label: qev010501_SEL0011
rows.name:
Declare that, if it was your team, you'd search
for your missing teammate immediately.

rows.label: qev010501_JNK0020
rows.name: Retreat

rows.label: qev010501_SEL0021
rows.name:
Repeat the mantra of safety first and
recommend they retreat and regroup.

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0008
rows.name:
See? You've got guts! What if our friend dies while
we're sitting on our asses back in NLA? What then?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0009
rows.name:
And if the two of us go missing as well?
How does that help Conner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0010
rows.name:
You think like a leader. You're willing to assume
responsibility for your people's lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0011
rows.name:
[ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] thinks like a damn coward!
Well, I'm done talking. I'm going to help Conner![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0012
rows.name: Aaaand we're back where we started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0013
rows.name:
This is difficult to ask, but...would you head north to
Sickle Rock Rise and see if you can find an Interceptor
named Conner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0014
rows.name:
He's part of our team. We got separated on a survey
job and he hasn't come back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0015
rows.name: Thank you. I know it should be me going instead, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0016
rows.name:
Honestly, we're both at a loss hereâ€”as you can
probably tell. I'm afraid if we go, we'll just invite
more trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'm sorry you had to see any of this, but know that I
really appreciate the help. We both do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0018
rows.name:
As soon as we know Conner's location, we'll do our
best to rescue him. Please help us find our friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Conner was investigating Sickle Rock Rise just north of
here. That's probably a good place to start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0019
rows.name:
While you're off searching for him, we'll get ourselves
prepped for the rescue. We really appreciate you
helping us out like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010501_MSG0021
rows.name:
We got beaten to a pulp when our survey mission
turned into an impromptu copper cinicula hunt.[ST:wait ]
